ygData.subject: Re: What gems combine with silver for magic je welry
ygData.msgSnippet: Earth Elementals can be found in Steamfront near the minotaur caves, they occasionally drop Star Rose Quartzes and lesser gems, and very rarely a bloodstone
ygData.messageBody:
Earth Elementals can be found in Steamfront near the minotaur caves, they
occasionally drop Star Rose Quartzes and lesser gems, and very rarely a
bloodstone ring or two. Fire elementals are probably available in
Lavastorm, and I believe there is occasionally an Air elemental in the East
Commonlands.

Giltik of Clan Tal' Moor, Tarew Marr

>Hey there, can people post what monsters give gems and where they are?
>Haven't seen earth elementals before...
